name: 2al2imi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))

stmt.origin: al2imi(s0, wal(s1, w0), wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))
-| wi(wal(s1, w0), wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w0), wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w0)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

comment: Removes two universal quantifiers from a statement. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 24-May-2011.)
